Also we accept and install for free any upgrade for your dedi , you must to buy your own hdd or ram and send it to us like is mentionated we will not charge for this (this feature is verry good for people who need more space for exemple)

Aditional ip for dedi is 1eur/ip or 1.5 dollars.

For vps servers we offer only the template what you have in the order list , if your desired template is not there please do not buy.


If you have any question about this offers please post here. Also our Skype username is :Netsilvania
